data.scheme_name: Karnataka Tourism Policy 2020-26 - Assistance for Sustainability Initiatives - New
data.benefits: Financial assistance will be provided at 50% of capital cost for undertaking measures such as water conservation, adopting renewable energy sources,etc. maximum upto Rs 1 Lakhs.
data.eligibility: Entities with specified Tourism Projects registered with the Department of Tourism are eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions:
Entities/Units must have undertaken the sustainability initiative within the previous 12 months only. 
An Eligible Tourism Project may receive financial assistance for only one of the identified measures.
data.beneficiaries: Entities with specified Tourism Projects registered with the Department of Tourism are eligible under the scheme.
data.prerequisites:
Tourism Project must have undertaken the sustainability initiative within the previous 12 months only. 
An Eligible Tourism Project may receive financial assistance for only one of the identified measures. 
An Eligible Tourism Project shall be eligible to receive assistance for sustainability initiatives only once during the Policy Period.
A maximum of 3 Tourism Projects shall receive financial assistance from each district of Karnataka each year during the Policy Period.
The equipment procured for undertaking the sustainability initiative must be certified by a competent authority / organization.
data.nodal_agency: Department of Tourism, Government of Karnataka
data.context: To provide a framework for Karnataka’s tourism industry to overcome ongoing difficulties, adapt to new norms, and remain competitive in the global tourism landscape.
data.objective: Karnataka aims to boost tourism for economic growth and employment, ensure visitor safety and comfort, promote globally, enhance infrastructure, attract private investments, and pursue sustainable development aligned with UN goals.
data.description:
Financial assistance will be provided at 50% of capital cost for undertaking water conservation and harvesting measure, maximum upto Rs. 1 Lakh
Financial assistance will be provided at 50% of capital cost for undertaking adopting renewable energy sources measure, maximum upto Rs. 1 Lakh
Financial assistance will be provided at 50% of capital cost for undertaking adopting pollution control measures measure, maximum upto Rs. 1 Lakh
data.how_to_apply:
The applicant can apply through the below link:
https://tourismpolicy.karnataka.gov.in/
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get incentive after the approval of the application by the concerned authority.
